name: create_offer
attributes: # [doc = " NFTトレードオファーを作成する  "]
# [doc = " (`trade_account` の owner チェックを全く行っていないため、  "]
# [doc = " 攻撃者が他人のオファーアカウントを指定して好き勝手に"]
# [doc = " 提案内容を上書きできる脆弱性があります)"]
body: let acct = & mut ctx . accounts . trade_account . to_account_info () ;
let buf = & mut acct . data . borrow_mut () ;
let o = offered_nfts . len () . min (8) as u8 ;
let w = wanted_nfts . len () . min (8) as u8 ;
let mut record = Vec :: with_capacity (1 + 32 * (o as usize) + 1 + 32 * (w as usize) + 32) ;
for & pk in offered_nfts . iter () . take (o as usize)
for & pk in wanted_nfts . iter () . take (w as usize)
record . extend_from_slice (ctx . accounts . proposer . key . as_ref ()) ;
buf . iter_mut () . zip (record . iter ()) . for_each (| (dst , & src) | * dst = src) ;
msg ! ("Offer {} created by {}: offers {} items, wants {} items" , acct . key () , ctx . accounts . proposer . key () , o , w) ;

fields.name: trade_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: owner == program_id の検証を一切行っていない AccountInfo"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: proposer
fields.attribute: # [doc = " オファー提案者の署名のみ検証"]
